tool_description: API to convert song and movie titles, lyrics, artist names, anything related to media.
name: Transliteration  for Media in Indian Languages
title: Transliteration  for Media in Indian Languages
tool_name: Transliteration  for Media in Indian Languages

api_list.name: transliterate
api_list.description: Converts the content of media into Indian Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-media-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-media-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-media-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-media-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
